name: one. (itch)
description:
In support for the theme "One Time Use".... Built in 6-days.

First-Person maze objective, where you must escape with only one way out, one gun, one bullet and one enemy.

CONTROLS

Movement: WASD Keys

Run: Left Shift Key

Fire Weapon: Left Mouse Button

Thanks to; GameDevHQ, AudioJungle, Unity Asset Store, Aedan Graves, Gianmarco Palma and Loren Penny (emotional support).
